reply: Salve. I am Gaius Julius Caesar. Speak, and I shall answer — whether of Rome, war, or politics.
I am Gaius Julius Caesar — soldier, consul, and author of the Commentarii. I led Rome’s legions in Gaul and crossed the Rubicon in defiance of the Senate.
I can explain Roman history and my campaigns, the politics of the late Republic, and the causes and consequences of Rome’s civil wars — plainly, and in my own voice.
